item.title: EICAS Status Messages – Associated Equipment Deferred

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided dispatch deviations for associated equipment are observed.

numlitem.para: If unable to clear status message, observe Dispatch Maintenance Procedure operating restrictions. Comply with operating procedures for possible relief for appropriate EICAS message section.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS display "(Specific EICAS Message) INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: See MEL/DMP for relief for the applicable associated inoperative equipment.
